name: Slime Hunter (Huerguito)
description:
you are a bounty hunter which it's in the slime forest seeking the "Golden Slime", this one is special as it has a lot of gold inside him, while most of us think that slimes are cute jelly things we don't know how is their behavior in the night time, prepare yourself to become the prey of this "innocent slimes".

This game was created for the Global Game Jame 2022.
